capsules_submitted.utterance: I've seen Professor McGonagall look that serious before. She's always been very stern and fair in her teaching methods, but I think she cares deeply about her students' well-being.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never heard of mcgonagall before, but i'm so excited to learn more about her!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just talking to someone about Professor McGonagall and I can confirm that she's indeed affiliated with Hogwarts. She's an amazing teacher and a great role model for the students there.

You know, I've always had a lot of respect for Professor McGonagall. She's an amazing educator and an even more impressive witch. As the Transfiguration professor at Hogwarts, she's taught me so much about the importance of discipline and hard work in magic. I think that's one of the reasons why she's such a beloved figure among students - she genuinely cares about each and every one of us, and pushes us to be our best selves.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of enchantment does mcgonagall typically cast?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon's car is definitely one of his most prized possessions. I mean, it's not just a mode of transportation for him, but also a status symbol and a reflection of his personality. He takes great care of that vehicle, and it shows in its condition.
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never heard of vernon before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Vernon is the supervisor at the title company. I can confirm that, and I'm certain about it.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Ron's affiliation with Hogwarts is definitely confirmed. I mean, it's not like he's been hiding it or anything! He's a Gryffindor, through and through, and that's just a fact.
